question: I have been athletic all my life, I just had my 64th birthday. I was diagnosed with CHF, hypertension, diabetes 2. I am on Coreg, Pravastatin,Glucophage,spironolactone,zetia,Diovan,Avapro, and lasix when needed.I am trying to get back in shape but I do not know what weight training or exercises I can safely do.Any help would be appreciated
title: 64 Yo athlete with ICD ,diabetes, and CHF
